      • inspectState

        public java.lang.String inspectState(Map myMap,
                            int stateID)
        This method gets the ID of a state and calls appropriate methods to finds its adjacent states, the continent to which it belongs and the country to which it belongs and shows the result to the user
        Parameters:
        myMap - Object of the Map class that contains all the information
        stateID - ID of desired state
        Returns:
        Information about the neighbors, continent and country of the state
